text: Jari Petteri Laukkanen (born June 12, 1965 in Kesälahti, North Karelia, Finland) is a Finnish male curler and curling coach.Laukkanen, Jari | Curling.fi He is a and a bronze medallist. He competed at the 2002 Winter Olympics where the Finnish men's curling team placed fifth.
